document_data.name: Joyella
document_data.mainbody: '''Joyella''' was a [[gnome]] and active member of the [[Zhentarim]] in the [[Underdark]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|19}}
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Joyella was a member of a [[Zhent]] party in the Underdark. They tried to rob an underground [[drow]] caravan but failed, and a bounty was placed on her. She was tracked and captured by two [[duergar]] bounty hunters. The duergar later tracked another bounty, the traitorous drow [[Arrizz]], to the [[Goodroot]] farm in the [[Moonsea]], but were killed by some [[adventurer]]s.
